details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.7.3 Version and conformance level identification - Conformance level.
details.description: A PDF/A-4f conforming file (as described in Annex A) shall specify the value of "pdfaid:conformance" as F

rule.description: A PDF/A-4f conforming file (as described in Annex A) shall specify the value of "pdfaid:conformance" as F

error.message: The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of "F" for PDF/A-4F conforming file
